Housekeeping was wonderful. Front desk staff was very friendly. We liked having fruit available to us all of the time too. Small thing, but a nice touch. My negative comment would be that the mattresses were not comfortable. I agree that the hotel could use some sprucing up, but I also realize that it is very difficult to keep a hotel right on the beach clean and fresh all of the time. Overall we were all very happy with both the hotel and it's location

Reviews.Title: “Holy Great Vacation Batman!”
Reviews.Author: TheTrupps
Reviews.Content: We usually travel from CT to Wildwood NJ, (the past 10 years) we decided to try something "different". We came across this hotel by accident (Good thing we did) using the Choice Hotels main corporate site because of my employer's discount. Let me start off by saying, I have traveled all over the country and stayed in all classes of hotels, the staff at this hotel was without a doubt one of the BEST I have ever encountered. Traveling with two daughters (ages 6 and 12) can get on the nerves of even the most patient of parents. The Atrium with it's birds, fish and turtles is amazing! It gave the girls something to do in the interim while mom and dad gather up the stuff for the days activities or (try to steal 10 minutes alone) LOL! The pools were VERY CLEAN!, Nice temperature and never crowded. The Atrium Cafe' was a nice stop for a quick bite or cocktail and had a very friendly staff. We chose a King room on the first floor opening into the atrium. I would say it was a great choice. The bar was only steps away along with ice cream and "Virgin" drinks available for the kids. The first floor rooms on the Atrium side also offer a greater sense of "security" than most "ocean front" hotels. Access to the rooms means you have to pass the lobby or cafe' before getting to the room definately a plus for families. The staff was more than willing to offer suggestions on dining, entertainment etc. and when they had no personal experience they actually told you that rather than just throw you some "tourist trap" suggestion. One other thing that impressed me as an experienced traveller, the front desk staff actually asked me how we enjoyed a few places that they had not experienced yet, this not only showed that they cared about OUR stay but wanted feedback for future guests. Another personal touch, my 6 year old accidentally left her custom embroidered beach towel (hope her Grandma doesn't read this) at the pool. We asked the next morning about it and instead of them having just thrown it away or placed it in some box under the counter, it was returned to our room WASHED, DRIED, FOLDED and wrapped in plastic!!

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: Kathy215
Reviews.Content: This hotel was wonderful. We could see the ocean and the beach from our balcony. 5 feet from walkway to beach. It was very clean and the staff were amazing, even though they were very busy over the 4th of July. The Atrium was a great added bonus. Kids seemed to love it especially when they let the birds out of their cages and they fed them out of their hands. I will definitely go back again.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect spot for family with kids!”
Reviews.Author: evandust10
Reviews.Content: My family recently stayed from june 26th to july 2nd. The hotel is right on the beach and only a short walk from the hotel. Oceanfront is definately the way to go. The view of the beach is great and if your with your family you can see them on the beach from your balcony .If you lug alot of stuff to the beach like our family, this is the perfect spot for you.The hotel caters to families and my 4 children, (ages 18 mths to 8 yrs old) loved the stay. The rooms aren't the best of the best, but are clean and room service comes everyday and cleans up your mess. The outside pool was great cause there was a bar right next to it and me and my wife had some nice cocktails as the kids played in the pool. For the location, amenities,and price we thought that the hotel was a great stay. I looked into the holiday inn on the boardwalk but an oceanfront room there was over 100$ a night more. We will definately stay here again.1500 for an oceanfront suite for 6 night.

Reviews.Title: “Underwhelmed... it was below average”
Reviews.Author: midatlantictraveler1
Reviews.Content: I came here with high hopes as I am a fan of many of the nicer Choice Hotels properties. This one, unfortunately, disappointed. Pros: Beach location, Coffee, tea, hot chocolate 24 hrs, nice outdoor pool, view is great, rooms are reasonably soundproof Cons -- listed below, mainly housekeeping and maintenance issues While the location is good, no place in this hotel (rooms included) had the "new and fresh" look and smell that draws guests back. The atrium area, while creative, is tired and dated. I kept wondering when the hallways and common areas would be cleaned when we were there. The atrium floor stayed dirty, the hallway on the third floor (oceanfront building) stayed dirty the entire weekend. Restroom by indoor pool was DISGUSTING! I don't quite know how to describe the smell in the lobby area -- but it was not pleasant either. I saw virtually no one using the indoor pool when I was there, and when I felt it was cold, I knew why. Kitchenette area (to include ceiling, walls, floor) was covered in greasy film, and stove was falling apart (literally). Air conditioning and bathroom fans are so loud as to be virtually unusable. That was room 306. I didn't check the brand on the bed mattresses, but they are absolutely the cheapest, poorest quality I have slept on -- even Motel 6 has better. You can feel every spring, and I don't even think they were old. This place sells itself as upscale, which it definitely is not. They even have their own marketing brochures and website to portray this. It's misleading.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding”
Reviews.Author: gillivray
Reviews.Content: This hotel stay exceeded my expectations. The hotel staff were professional, helpful, and friendly. The location is perfect, the room and common areas were very clean, and the amenities were just right. We arrived early (10 am) to take advantage of a beautiful day on the beach. I requested an upper level room away from the birds, thinking their noise might bother us in the morning. The receptionist took my cell phone number and called when our room was ready at about 11 am. Nice! They gave us the room on the south end where we had the added bonus of a window in the living area (sofa and TV) thus making it ocean view! Our room was VERY reasonably priced- $116 with the AAA discount. This was the building that they call the atrium, meaning the rooms overlook the indoor portion of the hotel where the indoor pool, koi pond, tropical birds (5 or 6 in separate cages), and indoor bar/restaurant are located. This is the "original" building that has obviously been updated as the room was lovely. At some point they added on the oceanfront building, thus enclosing the atrium portion between the two buildings. There is not an elevator for this original building, however there is an elevator for the oceanfront half. The outdoor pool is lovely and also has an outdoor bar with seating and music. The pool is in front of the hotel, on the opposite side is the beach. Our room was large, with a full kitchen, king bed, and living area with sofa and TV. The bathroom was quite adequate, no temperature problems with the shower, no smell or dirt of any kind. Parking was not a problem and when we checked out the following day they said no problem, park and stay to enjoy the beach as long as you'd like. We brought breakfast foods and snacks and drinks and went out for dinner at Fager's Island which was fantastic. We were lucky to be there on a beautiful evening with a perfect sunset. One of my favorite things about the hotel was laying on the beach and being able to go inside for a frozen drink to take back to the beach. They also have a huge basket of fresh fruit at the front desk, plus coffee near the exit to the beach all day long. We didn't use the exercise room but I would if we had stayed longer. Again, the staff were all so courteous and plentiful, helping at the front desk, sweeping and cleaning the common areas, making everything lovely for the guests. The guests were also very polite and friendly, no problems with any inappropriate behavior or comments or anything. We had a second floor room, so we did hear some noise above as we were settling in to get to sleep, which seemed typical from other places we have stayed where we had folks above us. I would highly recommend this hotel and can't wait to go back!

Reviews.Title: “Grandchildren's fun days”
Reviews.Author: effyfay
Reviews.Content: We have been coming here for the past seven or eight years. It's always clean and has everything we need. This year the Kids forgot their toothbrushes and we were supplied with them!! They have remolded and it's very nice. I like having coffee when ever i want it, it's on all day. We really enjoy the Birds too.

Reviews.Title: “Will definitely stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: harlygrl
Reviews.Content: My husband & I stayed here for a weekend trip. I am usually not a fan of Quality Inns from past experience but I was very impressed with our stay. The rooms were very clean & had everything we needed. The staff was friendly & very helpful with any & all requests. I truly recommend you stay in an oceanfront room. The sunrises are beautiful & if you are lucky enough to be there during a full moon that is gorgeous as well. The morning breakfast in the atrium restaurant was just enough before heading out to the beach. I will definitely stay here again!!!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel on the beach!”
Reviews.Author: DeeDeeDowningtownPA
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a four day stay with my hubby from June 23-26 at the Quality Inn Oceanfront and it was a very nice hotel. Check in was very fast and the staff were very nice. Hotel was very clean and nicely kept. We had a oceanfront efficiency executive room with a king bed and it was very nice and pretty big. We were on the third floor with a very nice view of the beach and ocean(really pretty). Had a nice balcony with a table and chairs. You could just go out from the back of the hotel and you were right on the beach. Had a very nice outdoor pool with a pool bar and deck with tables and high top chairs.They supply you with towels for the pool areas. There is also an indoor pool and 2 hot tubs in an atrium area with a bar and grill, pretty birds in cages, ponds with fish, and rooms overlooking these areas. There is a game room, fitness room and some nice lounges for reading and just relaxing. Had a area where you could get coffee throughout the day and fresh fruit out in the lobby. We had a very nice time at this hotel and would definelty stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Reviews and Pictures very deceiving!”
Reviews.Author: momofboys2005
Reviews.Content: This hotel is not as wonderful as some of the reviews will have you believe. Unfortunatelly, we went by the reviews and I wish we had stayed somewhere else. The room that we had was room 301.......beautiful view of the ocean which was the best part of this room! The room was small - not at all like the spacious pictures on line. The room we were in needed updated really bad! The room was clean, but not as clean as a Mom of little kids would like it to be and after the first day, it seems like housekeeping gave up and just made our beds. The bathroom was really bad (and it smelled like mold or musty or a damp basement!) The water in the shower kept changing from freezing cold to scalding hot - I was very worried about our kids being in there! Also on the second day, the toliet paper holder broke and they never fixed it. The screen to the balcony also broke and my husband fixed it himself thinking it would take too long to wait for someone else to do it. The refrigerator worked, but everything kept getting wet because water kept dripping from the freezer and we didn't even have anything in the freezer! The beds were not very comfortable although the kids didn't seem to mind them. The Atrium is nice and the kids got a kick out of the birds. The indoor pool was very cold and we didn't go in the outdoor pool. The hot tub was VERY hot and the sides of it were stained so it looked dirty. My husband said it probably wasn't because when he sat on the side of it with our boys he said that he could smell the chlorine. All in all, I would have to say we took it up the ol pooper because the room was definatelly not worth the money we spent to stay there (219.00/night) and now that I know better, I will never stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't stay there again - very disappointed”
Reviews.Author: merz1995
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I spent a long weekend June 18-20, 2011. The room was clean, but the kitchen area and bathroom are badly in need of updating (rust, leaking spigots, drop ceilings). I had the worst shower in my life, the water fluctuated every couple of seconds between scalding and freezing. The whole hotel looks older and a little worn out, but the worst part of staying there for me was the parrots in the atrium. They squawk and shriek really loudly from 8:00 a.m. to about 8:00 p.m. - its deafening in the atrium/bar area, and you can still hear them in your room. With all of the large hotels in Ocean City, I wouldn't stay here again -

Reviews.Title: “Bottom floor, oceanfront, convenient beach access”
Reviews.Author: esdugo
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the Quality Inn Oceanfront @ 54th St in OC from June 12 - 15, 2011. The hotel provided everything we expected for a couple days at the beach. For me, its all about location and convenience from room to beach and this hotel is as close to the beach as you can get. Its also small enough that you dont have to navigate through a maze of corridors, hallways and elevators to get from your room to the beach like you do in many of the mega hotel/resorts. That is why I prefered to stay on the bottom floor, room 116, second room from the end and adjacent to the side entrance door. Parking spots are just a few feet from the side door, which made loading in and out a breeze. The bottom floor rooms are actually elevated up 7-8 steps from the sandy area right below the balcony which does have a slight ocean view despite the sand dunes situated between the hotel and the beach. This is very convenient since we just left the sliding glass doors to the balcony unlocked and were able to come in and out of our rooms throughout the day without ever having to go inside the hotel or ride an elevator. We just locked all our valuables in the safe and closed the drapes and really did not worry about anyone coming in the room and staeling our tub of popcorn. Nice to have a full sized fridge and kitchenette with all the basics. A/C worked well, bathroom functioned properly, although not roomy enough for two people at once. 2 double beds were adequate, I had to ask front desk to send maids to flip mattress after first night and that helped my back a little. The springs in my mattress were shot and very squeaky, it needs to be replaced. Its a shame that many hotels dont buy higher quality mattresses and have them replaced when they are worn out. It was evident that this was a very low quality mattress. My wife did not have any complaints about her mattress so it could have just been that one. The TV and remote functioned properly although it needs to be upgraded from the big box tv's of the 1980's to a flatscreen HDTV commonly found in hotels today. It would also be helpful to have a channel line-up guide printed out on one sheet and laminated for all guest rooms. The on-screen scroll guide did not always work and frankly is just way too slow in our fast-paced instantaneous electronic world. I made this suggestion to a front desk clerk and she thought it was a great idea and would pass it up the chain of command. Very small details, I agree, but its the little things that separate a good hotel from a great hotel. The pool area was very refreshing, perfect water temperature. pool towels provided, lots of lounge chairs, and tables with umbrellas for snacking. Nice landscapping with flowers, bushes, and some trees to block the late afternoon sun. One day, the outside pool bar was open with some musice playing and beverage service. It would be a bonus if the hotel provided a few floats to relax in while in the pool. The one thing that caught my attention and really needs to be addressed by the maintenance staff is the issue of cigarette butts and trash. I believe the entire hotel is non-smoking, so most guest smokers go out on thier balconies to smoke. When finished, they just use the sandy area below as their ashtray. Between the back of the hotel where the lower floor balconies are and the sand dunes, there is a a 20-foot wide area of sand with 10 palm trees planted, which adds a nice island feel to the surroundings. All throughout this sandy area between the palm trees are thousands of cigartees butts which I had the displeasure of walking through many times a day during our stay. In some areas, it looked as if entire ashtrays with dozens of butts were dumped in one pile here and there. I saw several employees watering the plants nearby, but never did I see any of them pick up any trash or rake up any cigarette butts. May I suggest to the hotel manager to furnish each balcony with a "cigarette tower" for extinguishing the smokes and to include raking up all cigartees butts in the sandy area as part of the daily maintenance routine. When I visit next time , I will report back on the progress that has been made in this area. This will really enhance the aesthetics of the hotel and convey an image that an effort is being made to counter the pollution made by thousands of sloppy and inconsiderate guests. My overall impression of this hotel is positive and I would not hesitate staying here again. With a little fine-tuning and addressing some of the details this could become my favorite hotel in OC. It has the perfect location, a touch of charm, it just needs to be brought into the 21st century with some modern updates and a litlle TLC here and there to realize its potential. Please go and follow up with your experience for all to read. Happy Beachin' 2011 ! Eric D. Alexandria, VA

Reviews.Title: “conveniently located and clean”
Reviews.Author: Will&Michelle
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with some friends for a golf outing. The grounds and the beach were very clean, convenient for walking to drinking spots we frequented. Theres a bar/cafe on site which was great for breakfast before tee times, basic menu but convenient. The hotel has a bunch of parrots and other exotic birds that get pretty loud after 8am it seemed and yes they will wake you up if you want to sleep in after a long night of partying, The indoor pool and hot tub were very nice, The hole Atrium concept was pretty cool and the birds are beatiful but loud. The price was very reasonable for a hotel on the beach in oceancity, had no issues with staff and the front desk was courteous. Will return next year with my golf outing

Reviews.Title: “In a pricey town - this place is a bargain! Bring the kids!”
Reviews.Author: AdRock011
Reviews.Content: Well my comments here will serve to back up what most reviewers have said about this place. Its really a good deal in a town where you can expect to shell out $$$, in season. We stayed here the week before the Memorial Day rush, and it proved to be an ideal time. Crowds were light, beach was mostly empty... but most important of all - rates were CHEAP. The hotel experience will satisfy all but the most jaded or snobby of travelers. Yes its an older property with a boxy motel design, but care has been taken to dress up the grounds and interior atrium, which is really quite charming. Our oceanfront room was clean, the appliances newer and in good working order. If anything, some fresh paint and new carpets would do a lot for the appeal of the rooms. Same with balcony furnishings - a bit old and dirty. But bed was very cozy, A/C kept room comfortable, and it was a large and bright room. As for activities - if you have kids, they'll have a great time at the two pools, and will get a kick out of the atrium area with the live tropical birds, fish, and turtles. I couldn't keep my 4 year old out of there!!! :-)

Reviews.Title: “love love love Ocean City, Maryland!!”
Reviews.Author: Beki007
Reviews.Content: The Quality Inn Oceanfront is a dream destination! Everyone is so happy and professional! Our room looked right out over the ocean. Listening to the waves and watching all the fun below was fantastic! The Atrium with all the exotic birds is gorgeous. The location of the hotel is perfectly situated to access all locations easily. This was my 5th time staying at the Quality Inn and I will always make it my home away from home!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent package for the price!”
Reviews.Author: Dj521
Reviews.Content: You get everything you need and want at the hotel. The staff was very responsive to any need and absolutely wonderful! The location is great, pools are nice, hot tubs are cool, and the atrium is awesome!!! I would definitely recommend this hotel if you have kids! There is fresh fruit in the lobby every day and they have more to offer than most hotels! You get so much for a great price! People who complain must be unhappy with themselves because there is nothing here to be unhappy about! Love it!!! Life is what you make it and this hotel makes life enjoyable!!! Thanks so much to all the staff for a wonderful time! Don't wait, call for your stay now- you will be glad you did!!!

Reviews.Title: “Our kids love this place!”
Reviews.Author: Karyn1990
Reviews.Content: The key to this hotel's appeal is their atrium with tropical birds, two hot tubs, a small pool and a koi pond complete with a cute little bridge. If you can't get an oceanfront room, try to get a ground floor atrium view or else your room will open to the outside on the street side of the building and you have to trek outside to get into the atrium. The ground floor rooms open right into the atrium - a huge plus if it is cold/rainy. There is always a basket of fresh fruit at the front desk and fresh coffee by the doors going out to the beach. Breakfast at the atrium cafe is adequate and the bar has daily drink specials. The rooms themselves are very clean. Ours had a nice little kitchenette with a fridge, stove, toaster, sink, dishwasher and pots, pans, silverware and plates. Most toiletries are supplied (shampoo, conditioner, lotion, make up remover pads, soap), poolside towels were plentiful and surpirsingly nice. The pool itself looked really cloudy, though it was well chlorinated and they do maintenance on it every morning before it opens. A few more chairs in the pool area would be nice too. The kids really enjoy interacting with the birds - a couple of them talk a bit and one dances with you. My only concern is that the place is really starting to show its age and it could use better touch up cleaning throughout the day. Some slobby guests left plastic cups laying all around the pool deck and it was hours before anyone came to clean them up and the atrium bathroom was gross. It may be in the hotel's best interest to have someone keep an eye on the pool area when it's really busy and take care of that kind of stuff. The atrium is usually pretty noisy with kids in the pool during the day and then their partying parents in the evening, but if you are looking for complete peace and quiet in Ocean City, you are in the wrong resort - go to Delaware. Overall, we had a really nice weekend here and we will check this place first for our next trip to OCMD.

Reviews.Title: “Why is this # 7 ?”
Reviews.Author: tink50
Reviews.Content: First time to Ocean City Md and went by reviews to guide us. Rooms were clean enough but nothing wonderful. Beds were very uncomfortable The Atrium and pool area needed much updating and cleaning. The staff was a mix from friendly to an "I dont care" attitiude. The view from the oceanfront room was beautiful but, the balcony had was also in need of attention.. We had dinner down the street at the Holiday Inn and when we first walked in, we wondered two things 1) why didnt we stay here? 2) Why is this rated so far below the Quality Inn Oceanfront. Would not stay here again. If you like the feel of a boardwalk "motel" with a view- go here. I cant even imagine what this would be like if it was in season.

Reviews.Title: “We had a wonderful trip”
Reviews.Author: kndborries
Reviews.Content: The atrium was wonderful. My kids loved the parrots and the tropical scenery. The pool party on Saturday night was great. So much to do for everyone and right on the beach. The frozen drinks at the bar were great.

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME!”
Reviews.Author: Dj_Rick_G
Reviews.Content: The management and hotel staff should answered all of my requests (and I had many with 28 rooms in our party) with expedience and professionalism. Something you don’t see in any business anymore. I highly recommend this hotel if you are in the Ocean City, Maryland area. The rooms were accually neat and clean something else you don’t see much in a resort area. Thank you Quality Inn Oceanfront!

Reviews.Title: “The best mini vacation!”
Reviews.Author: rmdc29
Reviews.Content: I am so glad i discovered this hotel. This was our forst time to stay here and will definitely come back.! the hotel staff were VERY NICE and professional. Our room was directly in front of the atrium which was nice because we did not have to get in the elevator to go in the pool and the bar or watch the birds/fis/turtles. I gave the room only 4 stars because we had trouble with the toilet. they did not have 24 hour maintenance so nobody can fix the toilet at night. The staff was very nice to give us the nest room so we'll have a bathroom to use until the next day. Overall, it was a very nice stay!!!!! Definitely going back!

Reviews.Title: “Always Great”
Reviews.Author: alli3
Reviews.Content: We have been staying at Quality since 1993 we recently stayed from Dec 27, 2010 to Jan 2 2011 and we had the BEST time ever. The staff the cleanliness and service was great we bring our kids every year this year we had booked 3 rooms and we will continue to stay at the Quality for many years to come we take away so many great memories. They go above and beyond to make your stay enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “Wow a blast once again.”
Reviews.Author: poohzep
Reviews.Content: we stayed at the Quality Oceanfront Christmass 2010 week just as we have done since 1993 great family place .clean pool and spa. priced right.staff are very pleasing.plan on returning again. great winter vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Decent”
Reviews.Author: luzsbrain
Reviews.Content: Needed a single night stay for a business convention - found this room at a great price. In November the prices are really low. Upon arrival they upgraded us to an ocean front room. The room itself had a balcony and we could see the ocean - it was beautiful! The room also had a kitchenette, which is nice if we were staying longer. There is an indoor pool I didnt know about and the wireless only worked in the atrium and in the rooms on the other side of the hotel, but they gave us an ethernet cable! So that was great! Some channels didnt really come thru clearly, the paint seemed to be peeling in some places and the fan in the room was really loud, but other then that it was a decent stay for just one night The problem with November was that almost all the restaurants in the area were closed for the season.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, pleasant, great service”
Reviews.Author: SarahLou48
Reviews.Content: My friend and I spent November 5 & 6 weekend at the Quality Inn Atrium and was so pleased with the room, service and ambiance. The Inn created such a happy atmosphere that we simply couldn't stop smiling. The front desk staff responded quickly when we asked for special items like cake pans and we loved the unending pot of coffee and fruit in the lobby. It was a lovely visit.

Reviews.Title: “perfect for inexpensive weekend get-away”
Reviews.Author: johnar99
Reviews.Content: nothing overly fancy, but service and hotel desk employees very nice and personable; went for weekend getaway with spouse; 2nd time we stayed here; good location and great if you bring your kids since it has a nice indoor pool

Reviews.Title: “Nice Spot with some cool features”
Reviews.Author: Ponce1513
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a night for a wedding in town. Nice spot ... great location ... awesome ocean views ... stayed in room 419 ... only real complaint was that there were flys in the bathroom ... not sure why because the room was clean ... wasnt that big of a deal ... but i do recommend this hotel ... really cool lobby with birds and fish and a pool both inside and out.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, very friendly staff and beautiful view”
Reviews.Author: MonMon31
Reviews.Content: We came in late Sept so VERY affordable. When there were no bananas in daily available fruit basket, they were supplied immediately. Housekeeping staff was great (plenty of clean towels) and very accommodating when asked to return when we weren't ready to leave the room yet. Plus they mailed me back my raincoat that I left behind! The bartender was fun! (Get the mini egg rolls as a snack) Frozen drinks were delish! Front desk staff very helpful. And of course the Ocean view! The room was good too and beds were comfy...linens were nice, plenty of pillows. In room safe was useful. Overall our expectations were exceeded. Any hotel in OC has a ton of traffic, gets a lot of wear and tear and generally looks a little rundown, but I didn't get that vibe here. I'm not saying this was like a Ritz, but it will be my go to hotel in Ocean City!

Reviews.Title: “my family loves quality inn oceanfront”
Reviews.Author: rhonda28
Reviews.Content: We love the indoor pool and whirlpool, the birds in the atrium, our room, which is ocean front is just enought room for us, a family of three. The Quality inn has a computer room for adults and in the same room has play toys for the children. We came back here every year. We feel like it is our second home. We know the birds by name. My son was able to help feed them. The staff we do anything to accomodate their guests. Besides free fruit and coffee and tea we also recieve a free newspaper. In addition the Inn has an exercise room, free tanning and a game room. We love that we can do our laundry for free. Make sure to try the strawberry and pina coloda smoothies.

Reviews.Title: “Delightful”
Reviews.Author: ADKphotobug
Reviews.Content: Don't let the parking lot entrance fool you. Slightly dated, but in pretty good shape. Room was clean and bed/pillows were very comfortable. Third floor was great for viewing the ocean/beach. Beach access door was closed due to painting of deck but side door led to another dune crossing. Surprised at how clean this place was considering the amount of sand that can be tracked in. Atrium was interesting ... parrots and a few other exotic birds in cages were sometimes talkative; other times supplemented by "bird sounds" from speakers located in the shrubbery. Atrium served a good breakfast at a resonable price. Indoor pool and hot tubs were nice. Outside pool was even better; deep and wide enough to tread water and get some laps in! Very clean and refreshing on this early fall day in Sept. Only complaint: our refrigerator did not work and our delicious leftovers were spoiled. Front desk gave us a $10 credit to our bill without our asking! Let's hope they fix the fridge, though ...

Reviews.Title: “Check In a breeze, great location, Parrots were special touch”
Reviews.Author: goodeye2
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed recent stay "Sunfest Weekend". Had 2 reservations when we only wanted one and Ty at front desk straightened it out right away, no question. Room on 3rd floor was very clean, nice balcony over atrium as well as outside (although large tree in front of pool). Parrots were amusing and added a nice touch. All staff was courteous. Exercise room, small but adequate. Walk right from hotel onto path to the ocean. Hot tubs were drained & cleaned every evening. Outdoor pool cleaned every morning. Fresh fruit at front desk all day long as well as coffee & tea. Definately would stay here again...for a late night snack, good pizza,TVs with sports events, try Johnny's Pizza.....1 block down Atlantic.

Reviews.Title: “Not so "quality" inn”
Reviews.Author: Iammom
Reviews.Content: Buyers beware, although when booking our hotel for vacation we had a very pleasant experience with this the rest of our trip was a nightmare. When we checked in there was pubic hair in our bed and all over our bathroom floors. When housekeeping came up they were very upset and confrontational with us regarding our concerns. Although our room was cleaned we were afraid to make our other concerns known due to fear of retribution by the staff. Our room was filled with mold and peeling paint. Our front door looked as though someone had tried to kick it in and the door frame was broken all the way around. Our water temperatures were all over the place as well. We had a beautiful view of the ocean and a large balcony and the atrium of the hotel was very nice with the birds. We were supposed to get credited for part of our stay which never happened and still to this day after several attempts to get someone from customer service to help us we are still being ignored so I feel it very important to post this and my pictures so everyone is well informed before they choose this hotel, as I will never book through this hotel chain again!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “This was definitely a home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: kmack1023
Reviews.Content: With many visits to Myrtle Beach and the Outerbanks, I have stayed in several hotels. This was my first visit to Ocean City. The hotel was great. Great location. Room was very clean with fantastic view. Service was very efficient and staff was very friendly. Great room rate. Will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect room for the money . Four Stars”
Reviews.Author: twoofus08
Reviews.Content: Very clean room with 2 double beds, sofa & TV separated by curtain (if wanted). The kitchen was tiny, but had frig, microwave, dishwasher, sink, toaster & electric can opener and table w/ 2 chairs. Balcony right over ocean!!!! Only drawback was the bathroom had a small sink with not much room for stuff. They tried to make up for that by adding a shelf above the sink. There were no hooks on the bathrrom door for your clothes, but plenty of towels on the 2 towel racks. Water pressure was very low for my long thick hair . Both indoor & outdoor pools & small hot tub. Free coffee all day long!!!! However, we give it 4 stars & plan to go back next LAbor Day week. When the kids are back in school, it is less crowded for walking & sitting on the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Love Quality Inn Oceanfront Very Nice Inn”
Reviews.Author: Sox4Ever
Reviews.Content: My wife and 16 year old son and i travel to Ocean City this past August and having a big problem with Econo Lodge Oceanblock and canceling there we booked here. We were so glad we did cancel at Econo Lodge because Quality Inn Oceanfront was beautiful we love the location the pool and the pool bar was very nice, love the fruit basket they have for there guess so you can take any fresh fruit you like everyday. Love having walk on to the beach out of the back of the Inn. The inside bar area was very nice love ordering drinks and taking them to the beach (pina colada),didn't play tennis but they have two courts if you like playing and if you forget your racket they have some for you to used. The rooms were very clean and very nice, since we book the day before we got there (no thank 's to Econo Lodge Oceanblock ) we couldn't get ocean view rooms so our balcony face the courtyard area which was nice view any way. If we end up coming back to Ocean City next year for our vacation we are booking here again we love our stay at "THE QUALITY INN OCEANFRONT" book your stay here you will love your stay.

Reviews.Title: “Reminded us of an old motel”
Reviews.Author: Sewpretty
Reviews.Content: We didn't even stay. One look at the room that smelled like stale cigarettes, we got our money back and searched elsewhere!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: animald
Reviews.Content: Our family of 5 stayed for 5 nights in an Atrium view room on the bottom floor. Check in was fast and the clerks were friendly and answered any questions that we had about the area since this was our first time at Ocean City. Our room was clean and comfortable, even though we are used to sleeping on a queen size bed at home. The free coffee bar in the Atrium and free fruit at the front desk were nice gestures. We enjoyed the birds in the Atrium and one got so used to us coming up to him and talking to him that he allowed us to pet him. The cages were cleaned every morning. We enjoyed the pools, even though the outside one was not ocean front. The treck to the lounging area of the beach was a little long. It would be nice if a boardwalk could be installed to make the walk a little easier, especially when carrying a lot of things to the beach. The beach itself was clean and debris free.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Family Friendly Oceanfront Resort”
Reviews.Author: jackie32123
Reviews.Content: This hotel really caters to families with children. The atrium was full of tropical birds, and beautiful plants. There was a little pond with a bridge for kids to watch the fish and turtles swim. The view from our room was outstanding. We were able to save money by cooking in our room each night. The beach was fantastic. The outdoor pool and play yard was great for the kids. Each night the kids played in the indoor pool and game room. The room dividers were great. Each morning I could relax on the balcony sipping coffee and reading, while the kids were still asleep. It was such a nice time for all of us. Can't wait to go back next year.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: PMSheidi
Reviews.Content: My family and I have stayed at another hotels for ages but the poor customer service and poor maintenance caused us to look elsewhere. And was a gift! The staff, from check in through check out, cleaning staff and breakfast wait staff were friendly, accurate and customer service oriented. Had an ocean front view- so excellent to watch the sunrise, the surfers and beachcombers. I can't wait to return.

Reviews.Title: “A little pricey but was worth it parking...”
Reviews.Author: Mldibert
Reviews.Content: A little pricey but was worth it parking was very convenient. Loved the atrium with live parrots. Loved the pool. Super close walk to the beach with coffee waiting inside the door. Fruit basket available a day long. Top notch front desk staff. Only thing I would add is a waitress in the pool area.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay with Children”
Reviews.Author: irishuponastar
Reviews.Content: I live this place. The outdoor pool and playground were great. We did not have an oceanfront toom, but didn't miss it either. I could see the indoor pool/hot tubs from my balcony, and I could see the outdoor pool and playground from the porch, perfect with 3 ten yr olds. Desk staff very pleasant (with the exception of one man who never smiled) and the housekeeping staff was very acommadating. Room clean and updated, as was the bathroom. Kitchen very nicely equiped. Towels very thick and soft, and the bedding was obviously new. One of the two mattresses was not so great, but at least one seemed nice and firm. Pool water had some issues, but that was city wide, not the hotels fault. Food was decent for the price, which was reasonable for family budgets. I would stay here again, and plan to next summer. Location perfect for walking everywhere.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: 1GolfNut2
Reviews.Content: Took an ocean front room. Very clean and cozy. Veiw of the ocean was terriffic. Pull out coach was not that confortable but it's a coach. Everything worked in the room. Had a little problem with the key but the front desk took care of it immediately. One problem, the bar was located in the indoor pool area, my wife and I are not big on chlorine smell. Other than the bar, I would recomend this hotel to my best of friends.

Reviews.Title: “Many thanks to Mr. Hamrock and the rest of the staff!”
Reviews.Author: OceanLovingLandscape
Reviews.Content: Great location, great view, loved the atrium and the birds and the stone work, loved the polite staff, loved the peach trees on the walk to the beach, loved loved loved the ham and cheese omelets at the Atrium Bar...great price and excellent portions, adequate amount of parking. Definitely will be a return customer!

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Hotel/Motel -Not worth the money”
Reviews.Author: jcnmac6
Reviews.Content: We were expecting a spectacular stay at this hotel after reviewing the comments. It was awful!! The hotel was a motel and we were on the 3rd floor no elevator. The outside balcony made of wood was in very poor shape, ready to fall and DIRTY!! It smelled of garbage on the landing. The room itself was just ok. For 249.00 per night it should have been 100x's better. The indoor balcony over the atrium had outdoor carpeting that was so filthy I would not have put my dog on it. The furniture was also dirty and there was a leftover beer top on the table that stayed there our entire stay. I am sure the balconies are never cleaned. The atrium had 2 hot tubs and a pool that had dirt rings so dark there would be no way we were going to enter them. We also spotted cockroaches around the edge of one of the hot tubs. I had seen the CHOICE commercial on tv that advertised a comfy bed and great breakfast. Very misleading!! Our offered breakfast was at the front desk in a basket- apples and some very ripe brown spotted bananas. This hotel was not worth 249.00 a night. I wouldn't pay 75.00 per night! Due to this experience my spouse and I have vowed never to stay at a Quality Inn or any CHOICE Hotels again. We had stayed at other chains en route to Ocean City , not CHOICE that were 100.00 and under and were beautiful. POOR CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE : (

Reviews.Title: “Terrific value”
Reviews.Author: granmda
Reviews.Content: Made res in high season about 1 mo out. The experience exceeded my conceived notions based on the web site and the pleasant, honest res folks on the phone. The room was clean and was not oversold so my expectations were exceeded. It was spacious and had the view they described including to the ocean. (I recommended 221 on the end.) The kitchen was clean, full size frig (had grandson), stove and well stocked with kitchen "stuff" that was clean. We had breaky and lunch in the room. There was a heavy draw drape to separate the bedroom from the pull out sofa, on which the 8 y.o. soundly slept way past his usual rise time, in the living room area. Modern flat screen TV. The bath set up was very complete and the tub caulk was fresh and clean, wow. We had to call the desk on two occasions (nothing untoward) and they were at the door w/ the item practically before I hung up and were very very pleasant about it. Al the staff is well trained in customer satisfaction. There was no problem parking, and they have a terrific pool set up. Of course they are right on the beach and right on the bus line ($2 all day each) so u don't have to hunt up parking all over the island. So what is my reference point? I traveled over 1.5 M miles to many countries and have stayed all sorts of accomodations. This was not the most glitzy, ritzy exotic expensive place I stayed, but overall I'm stilling smiling (ok a little bit may be due to the grandson). To Q.I. staff ok uze guys keep living up to the standard And if I may in this tribute to the Q.I. right across the street is another terrific experience for adults and kids (go early if you have them), Mackay's Restaurant on the bay side.

Reviews.Title: “Great Weekend, Great Location, Great Price”
Reviews.Author: mhayduk
Reviews.Content: Quality Inn Oceanfront on 54th was a perfect location for my Husband, Sister and her boyfriend. We are all in the 25-39 age range and we wanted to be close to Seacrets but not in a dumpy hotel and we also wanted to be near the ocean. The hotel has a Indoor Pool with a Bar (in case of rain), an Outdoor Pool with a bar, and you can walk onto the beach. Great Location. Great Price. It was very clean. Room was nice. Room had a fridge so you can bring water/soda etc. Would def stay again and would recommend to a friend. Much nicer than Quality Inn on 17th, that we stayed at in 2009.

Reviews.Title: “this hotel's rooms are extremely outdated”
Reviews.Author: Char8433
Reviews.Content: lobby very nice...rooms very outdated.......housekeeping was poor....never really cleaned our rooms....did not leave towels....outside pool not cleaned up, trash throughout..would not recommend this hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location on the beach”
Reviews.Author: mammoth56
Reviews.Content: Oceanfront Room was clean and large enough for the four of us. The bathroom looked recently updated and the bedding was new.The view from the balcony was wonderful! We had problems with our first room and we were immediately moved to another room, and even moved once again without complaint by the manager. If you would like a quiet area, I would ask for a room away from the indoor pool , whirlpools and birds. The food at the on site grill was fresh and reasonably priced and fresh fruit was available at the front desk everyday. My biggest complaint would be the air conditioning....it didn't seem strong enough to draw all the moisture out of the room, so consequently towels, bathing suits, etc never dried.

Reviews.Title: “Great view!”
Reviews.Author: swimsters
Reviews.Content: Great balcony view right on the Ocean. Our room had a small stove,fridge and dishwasher and we enjoyed making breakfast and lunches(too many amazing seafood buffet restaurant's to have dinner in).The beach was clean and right outside the door and we could rent boogie boards and beach umbrella's. 2 Surf shops and great restaurants all within walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “Very Family Friendly”
Reviews.Author: sarelli15
Reviews.Content: Awsome atrium, my two year old was happy just to watch the parrots and gaze into giant pond stocked with koi and turtles! Not to mention indoor/outdoor pools. Oceanfront is so much easier with a toddler. Could stand a remodel, but still clean and comfortable. Kitchen is very handy for storing snacks and milk. We had a wonderfuld vacation!

Reviews.Title: “Great time!”
Reviews.Author: travelwithbaby27
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful vacation- much in part due to this hotel. Everything we could have wanted was all under one roof. The proximity to the beach was fabulous- we had a great view. The outdoor pool was clean and we were always able to find a chair. We also enjoyed the outdoor bar. The highlight was the indoor cafe. The staff was the best I have ever encountered. We ate there atleast twice a day. The service was fast, and the prices reasonable. The location of the hotel was perfect- within walking distance of anything you could want. I plan on staying at this hotel everytime I come to Ocean City.

Reviews.Title: “Fun Times and great service :)”
Reviews.Author: Hookie05
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed a wonderful weekend with my cousins at the hotel....great food, drinks and service at the Atrium Bar...Thank you Drew...very clean and comfy room as well! We will be coming back :)

Reviews.Title: “Yuck”
Reviews.Author: Sunkist101
Reviews.Content: Based on the positive reviews I read here, we booked this hotel for an impromptu one night stay last week at the tail end of our 2 week Deep South/ East Coast Road trip. I can safely say this hotel was by far the worst we stayed at on our trip. The hotel is run down, skanky, dirty, and in desperate need of a renovation. We took quite a few photos of our room and the facilities that show everything from stained sheets, to a dirty bathroom floor, worn furniture, and other unfortunate things we encountered in this hotel. I realize that hotel reservations are hard to come by in the OC during the summer months, but this place is most definitely NOT worth $200+ a night.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: mbatchelder
Reviews.Content: We stayed in 1st floor oceanfront room. VERY Clean! The hotel staff was extremely accommodating! The tropical atrium was beautiful and the birds were a very nice touch. Staff took care of all our needs quickly. The atrium bar and grill was great and convenient. We liked the hotel so much, we stayed an extra night. Would definitely stay there again and recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, will stay here next year”
Reviews.Author: waitingforthelotto
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just got back from our trip to OC, length of stay: 07/04/10-07/09/10. This hotel was such a great value. We did have to pay extra for the night of the 4th but that is to be expected. The rooms we so clean! Because there is no smoking in the hotel the rooms have a "fresh" smell to them. All the appliances that were in the room (small refrigerator, microwave, can opener, toaster and coffee pot) were all wiped down and spotless. There were only 2 negatives that I can say about this stay: 1. The second day by 3pm our room still hadn't been cleaned by housekeeping. Since we had only checked in the night before I was able to catch the housekeeper outside of our room and switched out dirty towels for fresh clean ones. 2. The birds in the atrium. Squawky and loud. At night they do place covers over the cages and you *do not* hear them, however, if you want to take a nap after a day at the beach it can be a bit difficult. Overall this stay was great. You can not beat the view, location and the cleanliness of the hotel. The front desk people were very helpful and friendly. Brook (?) was very helpful with suggestions for dining out. Thank you for a great stay!

Reviews.Title: “Great place for families”
Reviews.Author: eds3
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for the 4th of July weekend. We had a 3rd floor room w/an awesome view of the ocean. The hotel is right on the beach so don't have to travel at all to get there. A great, clean pool both inside and out for the kids to enjoy. The birds in the atrium were a nice touch as well. Excellent customer service and reasonable prices. Plus, a prime location for families.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome PLace to stay!”
Reviews.Author: jlm33177
Reviews.Content: Loved this hotel. Stayed with my husband and two children- ages 10 and 5. Nice big rooms, awesome view of the ocean. Very convienent. Restaurant/bar inside hotel was also very resonable. Will def stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Oceanfront Hotel”
Reviews.Author: tjames_mt
Reviews.Content: My kids & I enjoyed an oceanfront suite with kitchenette which was nice considering I had 3 teens, 8 & 10 year old with me. The room was very spacious & we had a beautiful view of the ocean that we enjoyed every morning. The hotel has a beautiful atrium with a pool & 2 hot tubs which were very clean & neat at all times. There is also an outdoor pool & play area that we all enjoyed.Both pool areas were supplied with fresh towels at all times. I must say that I was impressed with the overall cleanliness of the entire hotel. I have stayed at several different hotels on the boardwalk before but I must say that this by far is my favorite! When we return, it will be to the Quality Inn Oceanfront! The staff & management are very courteous & go above & beyond to make sure your stay is a pleasant & enjoyable experience.

Reviews.Title: “amazing family vacation”
Reviews.Author: 5forthebeach
Reviews.Content: we saved money by not going to Hawaii this year...instead we stayed at the Quality Inn Oceanfront....and had a very similar experience to that OF Hawaii... The room was great for a family, with a full kitchen, we save a ton by cooking in the room...and listening to the ocean out our slider was amazing. The pool was great, and the kids LOVED all the birds and coi pond. Everything was SO clean and well kept. We are already planning our next vacation there.

Reviews.Title: “New Look, and Clean Hotel"”
Reviews.Author: Getripe
Reviews.Content: Just have to start by saying what a great upgrade. I have been coming here for years but am very impressed with the new upgrades to this hotel. I would reccomend this hotel to all my friends if you want a great place to stay. The staff is excellent and the hotel is clean. The rooms have been upgraded and the interior...well just WOW!" You should definately check out the indoor pool and hot tubs. They are great especially on rainy days. This is a great place to stay. I recommend it to all my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant stay on the Ocean City beach”
Reviews.Author: lledford
Reviews.Content: My wife and I had a 5th floor ocean front room which was just perfect for what we wanted. We were there during theweek after Memorial Day, so the traffic was minimal and we apparently arrived before most of the high school seniors. This property is far enough north to avoid all the boardwalk hoopla. The staff were all very friendly and helpful. The atrium is nice and the food at the cafe was good. The view of the ocean was ideal and the room amenities with the kitchenette was perfect for staying in if you like. There is internet in the ocean front rooms ,but not wifi. That would be a nice addition toget wifi. There was also a drip from the air conditioner, but that was a minor annoyance. If you plan carefully , you can get some really good deals at this hotel. We plan to return again in November

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Hotel! Great place to be to do just about anything in OC!”
Reviews.Author: ws81713
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Quality Inn two weekends in a row, it's so great! The staff is wonderful and very helpful. They have parrots all over the place which is a very cool, different addition. My friends and I had the easiest access to Seacrets, Macky's, the beach and sub shops! We could walk everywhere- and it's a very reasonable price for everything you get! :) It's my home for the summer! I even left some belongings and they mailed them to me the next day!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome hotel, great staff, very clean!”
Reviews.Author: jmm41188
Reviews.Content: The staff were very helpful in providing restaurants, and other activities to do during the day as the weather during our stay was not the best. They did what ever they could to make our stay as comfortable as possible! It was a fun trip and a great hotel. I would definitely go back and stay at this hotel again!

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing Romantic Oceanfront Hotel”
Reviews.Author: hollik79
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here in May. The hotel staff was very helpful as we did not know the area. Our room was ground floor oceanview, we found it to be relaxing as well as romantic for our stay. The Atrium Room was neat, enjoyed watching the birds. They also have a great restaurant! They even offer free washers and dryers when you stay there that was an added plus. Will definately stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Quality Inn Ocean Front, Ocean City-Run don't walk away”
Reviews.Author: survivorlookinforfun
Reviews.Content: I just returned from a mini vacation with friends. We stayed at the Quality Inn Ocean Front. When we entered the hotel's "tropical" area. We saw parrots located in multiple areas. the last think anyone wants to see is bird droppings in the cages and a mess they have made on the floor near the cage. At night they cover the parrots with a vinyl cover...except one. One parrot has a white sheet with several holes (tacky rips) thrown over the cage. Upon arriving in our rooms, the air conditioner was broken...it was stuck. It was freezing in our room! The toilet didn't flush. I immediately went down stairs to report the problems which were address very quickly. Next, I found hair on the sheets. We called only to find out we had to go down stairs to get replacement sheets. The next morning we discovered, there was no fruit until later that afternoon. The fitness center didn't open until 9am. The room was freezing. One of the workers told one member of our party, he had to open the door to let some of the cool air out. The decor....all the interior plants were fake....plastic EVERYWHERE!. The canopy had a pile of dust. No one cleaned them! The doors of the fitness center had a pad lock. None of the fitness equipment worked. We were advised to use the facility at the 17th street Quality Inn the first night. The second day, we were advised to use the fitness facility at the Holiday Inn. We were told the rooms we had were handicapped capable. There was a small step upon entering the room (not accessible for someone in a wheelchair). Summary: Day 1: Broken air conditioner-fixed immediately Toilet didn't flush-fixed immediately Hairs on sheets Birds scattered in multiple areas. Debris from the birds were all over the floor. Workers placed birds chew and poopie toys on counter next to coffee and tea station. Day 2: Broken exercise Equipment Fruit arrived in the afternoon (other Quality Inn had fruit around the clock.)

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Experience”
Reviews.Author: HonestGuyDelaware
Reviews.Content: I have been enjoying this facility for years,but the quality and expense put into the recent renovations has really made this property top notch. A courteous staff and great amenities. Kudos to the management.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: vipers12
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel to stay in. the indoor pool was a great aspect of the hotel, especially because it rained one of the day's we were down there. the rooms were very spacious and comfortable as well as clean, which is something that is very important to me. we are going there in may to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: tropical_lover_86
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I decided last minute (Friday morning) to go to the beach for the weekend. The hotel we normally stay at was booked so we decided to stay at a new hotel. I loved the Quality Inn because of the Atrium. It is an indoor pool/ hot tub and bar. I loved that we could go swimming and the pool was very clean and the water was warm. The staff was very helpful and nice. Our room was very clean and spacious. We were on the 2nd floor ocean front and my only complaint was that we could hear the kids playing in the pool early in the morning and my boyfriend and I sleep in late. They also had parrots and tropical birds which was very neat. We did get dinner and drinks at the bar one night and the food was just average, but we did not feel like going out so we just got food there. I am looking forward to going back in a few weeks.

Reviews.Title: “July 4th Getaway”
Reviews.Author: jack21903
Reviews.Content: Our family and our sister's family enjoyed a quick getaway over Fourth of July and stayed at the Quality Inn Oceanfront. The rooms were clean, provided ample space, and a small kitchenette (which came in handy with 3 kids). The indoor pool area has an island theme and the on-site cafe' is great. My daughter and I enjoyed breakfast (she was 5 and an early riser). Then we went to visit the kids play area which was GREAT. So much easier than packing play toys for down times. Wonderful staff, the rooms were always freshened and stocked, the outdoor pool and bar area was wonderful for kids of all ages. It's right on the beach, so we had a blast playing in the sand, then just walking in to our room!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed Our Stay”
Reviews.Author: MissEbony1908
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I returned from Ocean City today from our mini vacation. We stay at the Quality Inn Oceanfront beacause of the price and the location which is right on the beach, and because of he positve feedback we saw on tripadvisor. I was pleased with pretty much everything. Check in was very smooth. When we got to our room I was so happy that I had a patio to walk out onto the ocean. And I loved the ocean view which is actually the first Thing I notice upon opening the door. I was also glad that the room had a full kitchen which was definitely a plus since it was just my baby and I, I really didn't want to dine out. So I cooked each night we were there. Also another plus was the dishwasher. The rook was very clean, but I did think the decor could use a little updating. Ms. Turner our housekeeper was friendly and did an excellent job cleaning our room and keeping things well stock and I would like to say thank you again to her. The indoor swimming pool was a definite plus since the weather wasn't quite warm enough for outdoor swimming. It was a little small though and seemed pretty crowded all day everyday, but that didn't keep the baby and I from jumping in. Overall it was a great stay and look forward to returning inthe near future. Oh I forgot to mention that this hotel is not on the boardwalk. You have to drive about two miles south, but that was a big deal. I would rather not be on the boardwalk to avoid the crowed beaches anyway. Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel i've ever experianced in my life!”
Reviews.Author: Cobez28
Reviews.Content: During my stay at the Oceanside hotel I experienced more than a handful of emotions. As soon as I stepped foot through their doors I felt right at home. Their employees greeted my family and myself with love only a mother could express. The room service was phenomenal, along with the cleanliness of the room. Cleanliness is a big thing in my eyes and i was certainly impressed with this aspect of my stay. My family and myself surly did leave knowing that the Oceanside hotel was the best hotel we've ever stayed at. We do plan on coming back.

Reviews.Title: “A Must Stay in Ocean City!!”
Reviews.Author: bosgirl05
Reviews.Content: This was our first experience visiting Ocean City, MD. My husband & I went for a weekend with another couple. From the first moment at check-in we felt welcomed & on vacation. As you walk into the Atrium it was like no other we have seen. It truly put us in a relaxed & stress free mood. Kevin & Kate at the Atrium Bar are fantastic. You have to meet them. The hotel staff were very helpful in answering our questions and very knowledgable about the area. We are making this a Must Stay on our list for when we want to get away!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel and Awesome Staff”
Reviews.Author: wendyschix
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful inspite of the Noreastern storm the weekend of 3/12/10. The hotel is under renovations and you would NOT know it. You can see the improvements, but the work was quiet and very clean!! We have stayed at this hotel several times and it just keeps improving. The staff is very hospitable, friendly, professional and helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel to a friend. The hotel is an older hotel for Ocean City Maryland, but it is definitely kept up with the modern times.

Reviews.Title: “Great fun and value”
Reviews.Author: ladyjane1
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel for many years. The kids really enjoy the atrium with the tropical feel and the birds. Not to mention the koi pond. The food is good but a bit pricey. Pool and hot tubs are well kept. There is an excercise room for those who can't take a break from working out. Hotel is undergoing a facelift and it will be even better when complete. Location is close enough to boardwalk but far enough to avoid congestion. Buses run and for a daily rate, you ride as often as you need.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel-friendly staff-PERFECT location”
Reviews.Author: zacmanh2o
Reviews.Content: We stay here every year, and this was the best year so far. Even though we were snowed in, the friendly staff and great amenities made it super fun for the kids! The atrium was under construction, but looks beautiful so far. Can't wait to come back and see the finished product!!!

Reviews.Title: “Family friendly.....”
Reviews.Author: wizor
Reviews.Content: I feel comfortable letting my 10 year old go and have fun with other kids in the hotel. The game room and birds keep him occupied and out of trouble. He absolutely loves the birds especially Wizor. Wonderful staff at the front desk and at the bar/Atrium cafe.

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING SERVICE AND GREAT AMENTITIES!!!”
Reviews.Author: Kramberry
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were sooo happy with this Quality Inn. Our only regret was that we could not stay longer and enjoy more of the ammentities. Our room was just perfect, with a full kitchen stocked with everything you would need to cook a meal for your family, even though we didn't feel like doing that at that at the time! The coolest thing about the hotel was the atrium. The atrium area is tropical themed, and all of the hotel rooms face it. There is a beautiful pool and a hot tub, and a pool bar/restaurant!! This was exactly what we needed to chase away the winter blues, it felt like summer all the time in the atrium. My husband, who normally complains about everything, loved this hotel also and had a great time talking to the parrots in the atrium area. The room was affordable. The front desk staff was so kind and accomodating. They recommended a great resaurant called "The Bonfire". This was our first time in O.C. Maryland, and we can't wait to come again and bring our kids. We will definitely be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Another enjoyable stay here”
Reviews.Author: artguy5
Reviews.Content: Although some places are closed in April, this is a fun visit. The tropical birds are interesting. The indooor pool and hot tubs are fine. The staff is always helpful and the rooms have been fine. We'll return.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is a delightful place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Pat026
Reviews.Content: The rooms are well appointed and the ocean front rooms have a lovely view. I especially like the atrium where I can stroll and watch the koi and talk to the parrots and macaws. (A few even speak back. ) The indoor pool is a good size, clean and warm, and the two hot tubs are well maintained. Coffee and tea are available in the atrium; fresh fruit is kept on the front office desk, as is a free daily newspaper. There is also a small restaurant/bar located in the atrium. The hotel's location is convenient to the Route 90 bypass. The staff was very friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay to "get away"”
Reviews.Author: DwDaffy
Reviews.Content: We have been taking weekend getaways to this hotel for years. The atmosphere of the atrium is great! It so nice to relax in the heated pool and hottubs surrounded by tropical birds and palm trees. The food from the atrium bar and cafe is very reasonably priced and decent. There is a gym and an arcade with a pool table in the basement. You really can't beat the location.

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: kurtie63
Reviews.Content: the view is Great-the atrium is Great-the bartenders,Kate and Kevin are Great-the entire staff is Great-the price is Great- what else could you want???

Reviews.Title: “I had a great stay!”
Reviews.Author: dcrosby
Reviews.Content: I stayed in an oceanfront groundlevel room with kitchenette. It was perfect for my young daughter and I. The room was large for our purposes and the divided allowed me to put her to sleep and stil be up myself. It was clean and had all the little things that made our lives easier. The staff was lovely. We could walk out our door and over a slight dune to the sea -- which is ideal with little ones as you do not have to cart everything too far. All in all we had a great time.

Reviews.Title: “Great value and location”
Reviews.Author: KFP54
Reviews.Content: This hotel continues to be a great value. We have stayed here many times over the past 22 years and still enjoy it. Even though the hotel is an older property, it is always clean and the rooms are large and comfortable. We especially enjoy the atrium with the macaws and other birds. Our daughters grew up being entertained by them and the indoor pool is great when the weather does not cooperate.

Reviews.Title: “Bed Bugs...Stay away!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: BeachBumsz
Reviews.Content: Dated, worn look and musty smell dominated the beautiful ocean view. Creepy crawling feeling after leaving the hotel. Plus the little red bug bites to go with it. Do not go here unless their are major renovations and new management.

Reviews.Title: “Overall a comfortable stay, but pricy...”
Reviews.Author: jlbigguy
Reviews.Content: I am always surprised at the negative reviews, and take them with a grain of salt. No place is perfect, and some people nitpick just for the sake of it. This was the first time we stayed at this QI, and the stay was pleasant (in spite of all the negative reviews). Upon check in, the front desk politely told us that the previous occupants complained that the room had a smokers odor. They gave us a key to see if the room was acceptable. It was not, as it definitely smelled from smoke. They placed us in another oceanfront room on the first floor, and allowed us to check out the room before checking in. This room had no odor, and was in the process of being cleaned. The front desk was very polite, and we appreciated them warning us of the odor in the first room. The room was large and clean, with a full size refrigerator. Having two bathrooms in the room was great! Bathrooms were clean, beds were comfortable. A sliding divider was between the living area and the beds, and was convienient as I am an early riser. The carpet was buckled in a couple of areas, but that is to be expected in a beachfront hotel as the carpet must be vacuumed daily to remove sand. Was the wallpaper dated? I didn't notice. The furniture was clean, and all lights and appliances worked. Our room was cleaned promptly everyday at 10am. Indoor and outdoor pools were clean and pleasant. The hotel location was perfect, walking distance from the boardwalk, but far away enough to be quiet at night. While the hotel is non smoking, you will find many guests smoking on the balconies, and the odor can be annoying when you are on your balcony. The restaurant is open for breakfast only, and is reasonably priced. We would have liked to see it open for lunch as well. The beach cafe was only open once during our 4 day stay. Would have been nice to be able to get ice cream and snacks without leaving the hotel. Overall we enjoyed our stay at the QI. An OK stay, not exceptional, but certainly not terrible as some of the reviews have stated.

Reviews.Title: “Place is really showing its age!!!!”
Reviews.Author: jjrpaul
Reviews.Content: My wife and I typically visit OC every year for 4 nights, and we have stayed at this place each time, and have great memories of earlier times here when our children were young. But I must say that this may have been our last, as the place is really in need of renovation, and there are other places to stay at OC that charge equivalent rates. We always get an oceanfront efficiency room. apt, and we both noticed immediately that the screen in the screen door was torn big-time at the bottom, so we could not enjoy fresh air in the evening w/o letting in some bugs. How the chambermaid did not notice that is beyond me--it's as if they or the management don't care. The AC thermostat system in our room could not be regulated--you either had it on or off, no in between. Luckily, we don't mind sleeping in a cold room with blankets. The woodwork molding around the entrance door was separating from the frame, such that the security latch could not stop a two year old. The two chairs and the glass table on the balcony had blotches of dried paint all over them, again, a sign that whoever maintains this place does so with little care. (I guess one should be happy that they painted the outside?) On the day we arrived and on the 2nd day, the sevice elevator was out of order, forcing all the guests and the service people to share one elevator covering five floors. It was deja vu, as we found the same situation a year ago when we stayed there. With our children grown and long gone, we no longer use the indoor or outdoor pools, but they did not appear to be in the cleanest condition, especially the indoor one. To its credit, the place seems to have improved the appliances, cabinets and the beds. So we have no complaints there. My wife and I are not fussy travelers; we have stayed a very nice places and very modest places here and abroad. And we also realize that it is harder to keep a beach resort clean and in shape given the constant trudging in and out of sandy feet and humid salty air. But it seems like this place charges a lot and gives you little in return. They don't seem to care about investing in the place, I guess because the location is good and people like me keep coming back. I think that is about to end.

Reviews.Title: “Families with toddlers BEWARE!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: allboutmykids
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel numerous times and always have found it to our liking. This time was no different except for one large difference. I have a two year old daughter and she will pretty much try anything and get into everything. Well we stayed on the fifth floor and we were ocean front. We love to here the noises coming of the beach so we used to like to keep the door to the balcony cracked so we could hear the waves crashing. However on the balcony the bars are so far placed apart my daughter had her whole head and half of her body through the bars before my husband grabbed her arm. So she was not aloud on the balcony while we were there. I mentioned this to the front desk and was told that they have netting but they do not put it up because some people say it effects the view for them. I told her I believe this needs to be fixed, I mean even if I had the netting how strong is that. I was also given a room with out a bath tub, it only had a handicap shower with a two & seven year old this was not convienent. So if you stay here and need a actual bath tub you need to inform them of that when you make the reservation. It is a nice hotel besides that though, but I don't think I will stay here again until they fix the problem with the balconies.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: lindeery
Reviews.Content: Hotel was very nice, staff was extra nice and mad you feel as if you were at home ! Our room had all new appliances and carpet! i will be coming back to this hotel next year for my summer vacation!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Oceanfront Location”
Reviews.Author: milano14
Reviews.Content: This was our first visit to Ocean City, so we weren't exactly sure what to expect. Stayed 3 nights at the Quality Inn Oceanfront. I felt that the price of the hotel room was on the expensive side, but during my initial research found that it was a common rate for Ocean City. We originally booked a poolside room. I figured that the poolside room would still have a balcony and view to the outside, just not the ocean. So after checking-in we went to check out our 2nd floor poolside room. The room itself was fine, but it had no natural light. There were 2 small windows on either side of the door into the hotel room, but no natural light made it through them because the overhang from the walkway/porch above was so deep. And at the other side of the room, the sliding doors went out onto an interior balcony that opened up in the atrium, 'tropical oasis', area. If you don't want to see the sun or outside while staying at this hotel than this room would be fine, but I need some natural light. So we went back to the front desk and upgraded to an oceanfront room (which surpisingly was only $50 more total for our 3 night stay). This was the best desicion. Our hotel room was clean, not fantastic, but clean and the view was great. I agree with the previous reviewers comments about the tropical oasis/atrium. It didn't appear clean at all (we did not use the indoor pool or hot tubs at all). The birds in their cages were covered up at night, so they weren't loud all night long. But the covers were removed at 730/8am so if we were late sleepers they would have woken us up every morning. For this hotel I would recommend an oceanfront room on the 4th or 5th floor. Nothing lower; otherwise when you walk out of your room you are in the 'tropical oasis'. The beach at the hotel was perfect location, not too busy, and very easy to access from the hotel. We also did not use the outdoor pool, but it was always very busy. And in the middle of the parking lot. Also, the gym is very small and the free wireless internet was spotty. We could not always get it to work.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Staff at the Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Beachy159
Reviews.Content: We recently took our summer vacation, and stayed at the Quality Inn, on 5400 Coastal Highway in Ocean City, Md. The Hotel was very clean, and the Staff were terrific. Whomever is managing that Hotel, is doing an Excellent Job!

Reviews.Title: “Rare Compassion and Understanding. We'll Be Back!!”
Reviews.Author: cpf172
Reviews.Content: At a time when so many companies are watching every penny and lacking in the customer service department, I was so pleased with our interaction with the reservations desk at Quality Inn Oceanfront. We were scheduled to visit last weekend, but my son was hospitalized Friday night. Expecting to lose all of our money, we'd thought we'd try to apply it to another visit down the road at least. The reservations desk, with no questions asked, refunded the full amount despite the cancellation policy. My son is out of hospital and healthy and we'll certainly be back at this hotel in the next few weeks to enjoy our time at the beach!!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay with children”
Reviews.Author: nsammons111
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Quality Inn with my 8 year old grandson and some friends. We had a great stay. The Hotel has everything you need without going anywhere. The beach is close. The outside pool is very nice and has a bar. I felt very comfortable letting my grandson wander around. He loved the birds. I will definatley stay again.

Reviews.Title: “The friendliest, most interesting, and most fun in OC for all ages !!”
Reviews.Author: mustangallie
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at this hotel for many years, and used to bring my children, we would stay both in the winter and summer. my children are now bringing their children and their friends and their children. This is a hotel you can enjoy staying right there in the evenings and you do not have to go out and eat (it has a fully equipped kitchen) or go to the boarkwalk every night.It is family friendly, has an indoor pool, game room,toddler play room, dvd player and movies, and of course the parrots !!!!! I love it and I am 62 years old, I will never stay anywhere else. The rooms are great, the staff is excellant, the beach is beautiful, what more could you ask for ?? I used to give my grown children gift certificates to there for Christmas so we could all go together. My grandchildren said it was the best gift they ever got !!

Reviews.Title: “Great beach, smelly, noisy hotel”
Reviews.Author: OmniRiot
Reviews.Content: We stayed in an "Ocean View" room, which had a wonderful view of the ocean. This alone made the stay worth it. However, the hotel had several unpleasant "features".
